sentences.en: Cut the cabbage into fine long shreds.
sentences.cn: 把这棵卷心菜切成细长条。

sentences.en: Don't you want me to have a shred of credibility in the briefing room?
sentences.cn: 难道你不想让我在简报室里有一点点可信度 吗 ?

sentences.en: Finely shred the carrots, cabbage and cored apples.
sentences.cn: 将胡萝卜、卷心菜切成细丝并给苹果去核。

sentences.en: He instructed staff to shred sensitive documents.
sentences.cn: 他吩咐员工将机密文件用碎纸机销毁。

sentences.en: He made the accusations without a shred of evidence to back them up.
sentences.cn: 他提出的指控毫无证据.

sentences.en: He was left without a shred of self-esteem.
Mice will shred things such as newspapers.
sentences.cn: 老鼠会扯碎报纸一类的东西.

sentences.en: See all that tells me there's still a shred of decency left inside you.
sentences.cn: 这一切告诉我,你还有一点良心.

sentences.en: Sort loose papers into piles: file, shred, and recycle.
sentences.cn: 将散页分类整理成堆: “文件” 、 “废物”以及“回收利用”.

sentences.en: The food processor can shred all kinds of vegetables.
sentences.cn: 这架食品加工机可将各种蔬菜切丝切条.

sentences.en: There is not a shred of evidence for his guilt.
There is not a shred of truth in what he says.
sentences.cn: 他说的全是骗人的鬼话.

sentences.en: There isn't a shred of truth in that statement.
sentences.cn: 那种说法一点也不符合事实.

sentences.en: There was not a shred of truth in what he said.
They reckoned he was a hatchet man, out to shred the workforce and crush the union.
sentences.cn: 他们估计他是上司派来的刽子手，专门对工人大开杀戒，大肆镇压工会。

sentences.en: We had never seen one shred of evidence.
sentences.cn: 我们还看不到有丝毫迹象.

to cut or tear something into small thin pieces
to cut or tear something into small thin pieces
